name: Adventures of the Iron Man
description:
Adventures of Iron Man

Created By: Jake Westerkamp

This is a Puzzle game where the objective is to get the crates to the green check mark blocks.  There is also an enemy you must avoid in order to complete the levels. If you get touched by it then you must restart. Good Luck and have fun!

PRESS SPACE TO START

Controls:

Arrow keys to move

X will push the crate away one block

Z will undo a move

R will restart the level
